requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Sections of the map will load in more slowly on lower end computers (World streaming can be CPU heavy)
